testcase.name: Normal Add To Chart Item
testcase.system-out: Given User open the website sauce demo......................................passed When User input "standard_user" as userName and input "secret_sauce" as password.passed And User click login button.................................................passed And User sort filter "Name (Z to A)'".......................................passed And User pick item 1 "Sauce Labs Onesie"....................................passed And User pick item 2 "Test.allTheThings() T-Shirt (Red)"....................passed And User click the cart icon................................................passed And User input "Rico" on First Name field...................................passed And User input "Rinaldi" on Last Name field.................................passed And User input "17421" on ZIP or Postal Code field..........................passed And User click continue button..............................................passed Then User directed to check out overview page...............................passed And User click finish button................................................passed Then User completed checkout proses.........................................passed
